description:
Hello Folks , 
One room is available for the month of June only. 
Rent is 520 including utilities . 
The room actually comes furnished with a full size bed , table and chair and a closet. Room also has a big window. 
The house is located near the Old dublin bakery and Colemans.
There are three other roommates who are very kind and considerate. We would prefer someone who is comfortable with cats. 
Please feel free to reach out or drop by to see the place. This is best for somebody looking for a short term rental. See less See less
